notes: Shares cooldown with Medallion of Courage-based items.
The effect on self and the modifier on the target are independent from each other. Dispelling the target does not remove the effect on the caster.

Unlike Medallion, Solar Crest does not place a debuff on the caster. Instead, its effects are directly bound to its cooldown. Its duration is always 12 seconds on the target, while the duration on self varies with cooldown manipulation (i.e. cooldown reduction and resetting). When the ability's cooldown is reduced, the reduction effects on self are briefer. The reduction effects on self also disappear immediately when the cooldown is refreshed. This also means that the effects on self are also applied when using Medallion of Courage, since they share a cooldown.

The armor reduction on self fully stacks. When having multiple Solar Crests, each of them reduces armor when on cooldown.

The target buff/debuff fully stack with each other. The effects on self also stack with the target debuff. When a unit is targeted by an allied and an enemy Solar Crest, the modifiers effectively cancel each other out. When opposing heroes cast it on each other, they effectively have -12 armor, -10% movement speed, and -50 attack speed. Multiple target debuffs or target buffs do not stack but refresh their durations. The target buff, target debuff and self-debuff fully stack with Valor.

abilities.description: When cast on an ally, grants them 6 armor, 50 attack speed, and 10% movement speed. When cast on an enemy, removes 6 armor, 50 attack speed, and 10% movement speed. Removes the armor from the caster when used. Cannot target spell immune enemies.
